meanings.definition: In an aoristic manner; without regard to specific time or duration.
meanings.sent1: She aoristically completed her homework without worrying about the exact time it took.
meanings.sent2: He aoristically approached the task, focusing on the end result rather than the time it would take.
meanings.sent3: The cat aoristically chased its tail, not caring how long it took to catch it.
meanings.sent4: The clouds moved aoristically across the sky, as if time had no hold on them.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed aoristically, unconcerned with the minutes passing by.
